clinical_study.brief_title: Diagnostic of Iron Deficiency by Means of Non Invasive Measurement of Zink Protoporphyrin IX
clinical_study.official_title: Diagnostic of Iron Deficiency by Means of Non Invasive Measurement of Zink Protoporphyrin IX

brief_summary.textblock: ZnPP is being build in the case of a functional iron deficiency. Zinc instead of iron is implemented into protoporphyrin IX. This ZincProtoporphyrin (ZnPP) can be detected non invasively. Non invasive and invasive optical measurement of ZnPP will be compared. Additionally ZnPP measurements will be compared to other iron deficiency parameters for validation by the investigators.

detailed_description.textblock:
Zinc-protoporphyrin (ZnPP) will be measured by a fluorescence technique. Restricted wave light (407/425 nm) is used to detect ZnPP in the bloodstream non-invasively through the oral mucosa. The spectroscopic measurements are translated into a ZnPP value (mumol/mol heme).
The non-invasive measurement of ZnPP is validated and compared to optical measurement of ZnPP in whole blood and high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) measurement of ZnPP in whole blood.
The ZnPP value is compared to other iron-deficiency parameters: Ferritin, Transferrin saturation and soluble Transferrin receptor.

primary_outcome.measure: Validation of the non-invasive ZincProtoporphyrinIX measurement
primary_outcome.description: The value is compared to optical measurement of ZincProtoporphyrin in whole blood; in addition the value is compared to HPLC measurement in whole blood

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of the ZincProtoporyphyrinIX value to other iron-deficiency parameters
secondary_outcome.description: The value is compared to Ferritin, Transferrin saturation and soluble transferrin receptor

arm_group.description: Patients present themselves before an operation to the Anesthesiologist. They are screened for study eligibility.

intervention.description: Within 30 seconds, a measurement is performed on the lip of a patient to determine a ZincProtoporphyrin value

study_pop.textblock: Patients prior to a surgery, seen in the Anesthetic clinic for evaluation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients seen preoperatively in the Anesthestic clinic
- Patients > 18 years of age
- Understood and signed patient consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- transfusion of blood products 8 weeks prior to screening
- Pregnancy
- Porphyria
